sourceitem.name: AlbumArtExchange
sourceitem.comment: Find a quality cover for this album

sourceitem.name: Discogs (Artist)
sourceitem.comment: Discogs shows information about this artist

sourceitem.name: Explorer View
sourceitem.comment: This will browse to the folder of the current playing item

sourceitem.name: Google Search (Song)
sourceitem.comment: Search with Google for this song

sourceitem.name: Last.fm (Artist)
sourceitem.comment: See more information about your artist on Last.fm

sourceitem.name: Facebook (Artist)
sourceitem.comment: Shows the Facebook page for the artist

sourceitem.name: Twitter (Artist)
sourceitem.comment: Shows the Twitter page for the artist

sourceitem.name: Metalstorm (Album)
sourceitem.comment: Search www.metalstorm.ee for this album

sourceitem.name: Metalstorm (Artist)
sourceitem.comment: Search www.metalstorm.ee for this artist

sourceitem.name: MetroLyrics (Song)
sourceitem.comment: The World's #1 Lyric Site

sourceitem.name: RateYourMusic (Artist)
sourceitem.comment: Search RateYourMusic for this artist

sourceitem.name: Songfacts (Artist)
sourceitem.comment: For more info like artist lyrics and trivia

sourceitem.name: Songfacts (Song)
sourceitem.comment: For more info like song meanings, lyrics and trivia

sourceitem.name: SoundCloud (Song)
sourceitem.comment: Search SoundCloud for this song

sourceitem.comment: Search Swisscharts for this album

sourceitem.comment: Show this song on Swisscharts

sourceitem.comment: Shows the wikipedia page for this artist

sourceitem.comment: Search with Yahoo Music for this song

sourceitem.comment: Search with Yahoo for this song

sourceitem.name: YouTube Video
